div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:35 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 72. South wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. South southeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Sunny, with a high near 83. South southwest wind around 5 mph becoming north northeast in the afternoon.

font.marquee: All meetings related to the school improvement process have been postponed! Watch for updates how TICKET HOLDERS can view "Clue" All School Play, tickets are available at brown papertickets.com or at the school office.

div.p: Seventeen Heartland FBLA members competed at the Peru State College Business Contest. Tests were taken in the following areas: Accounting, Business Communication, Business Ethics, Business Law, Business Math, . . .

div.p: Graduation 2020 is scheduled for August 1 at 2:00 PM in the north gym. If we are not able to hold such a gathering at that time, plans are in motion to have a virtual graduation to honor our graduates. CONGRATULATIONS CLASS OF 2020!
